results.title: Antidiabetic Activity of Afobazole in Wistar Rats.
results.text_hl: Using the @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@ model of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ in Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, we compared antidiabetic activity of anxiolytic @CHEMICAL_2_((2_morpholino)ethylthio)_5_ethoxybenzimidazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C410924 @@@Afobazole@@@ with that of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. @CHEMICAL_2_((2_morpholino)ethylthio)_5_ethoxybenzimidazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C410924 @@@Afobazole@@@ in a dose of 10 mg/kg reduced @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hyperphagia @DISEASE_MESH:D006963 @@@polyphagia@@@ and prevented accumulation of @CHEMICAL_Malondialdehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008315 @@@malonic dialdehyde@@@, being not inferior to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a dose of 300 mg/kg, and was even more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in body weight recovery, elimination of @<m>DISEASE_Polydipsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059606 @@@polydipsia@@@, and preservation of these effects after treatment withdrawal.

citations.NLM: Ostrovskaya RU, Ivanov SV, Voronin MV, Ozerova IV, Zolotov NN, Seredenin SB. Antidiabetic Activity of Afobazole in Wistar Rats. Bull Exp Biol Med. 2018 Sep;165(5):649-652. PMID: 30225697
citations.BibTeX: @article{30225697, title={Antidiabetic Activity of Afobazole in Wistar Rats.}, author={Ostrovskaya RU and Ivanov SV and Voronin MV and Ozerova IV and Zolotov NN and Seredenin SB}, journal={Bull Exp Biol Med}, volume={165}, number={5}, pages={649-652}}

results.title: [Sequential treatment with insulin glargine and metformin, and exenatide in a patient with newly diagnosed type-2 diabetes].
results.text_hl: [Sequential treatment with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ glargine and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with newly diagnosed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type-2 diabetes@@@].

citations.NLM: Kress S. [Sequential treatment with insulin glargine and metformin, and exenatide in a patient with newly diagnosed type-2 diabetes]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2010 May;135(18):907-10. PMID: 20425675
citations.BibTeX: @article{20425675, title={[Sequential treatment with insulin glargine and metformin, and exenatide in a patient with newly diagnosed type-2 diabetes].}, author={Kress S}, journal={Dtsch Med Wochenschr}, volume={135}, number={18}, pages={907-10}}

results.title: Combination exenatide-sitagliptin therapy used with glipizide in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was later discontinued due to elevated liver function test values.

citations.NLM: Patel MB, Elmore LK, Edgerton LP, Whalin LM. Combination exenatide-sitagliptin therapy used with glipizide in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Am J Health Syst Pharm. 2012 Jun 15;69(12):1044-8. PMID: 22644981
citations.BibTeX: @article{22644981, title={Combination exenatide-sitagliptin therapy used with glipizide in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus.}, author={Patel MB and Elmore LK and Edgerton LP and Whalin LM}, journal={Am J Health Syst Pharm}, volume={69}, number={12}, pages={1044-8}}
